messages.messageBody:
http://bts.cside.ne.jp/tokgarchrgar/work/oeb/oeb_shinsengumi.html


This artist generally focuses more on the Ishin, but the above link goes to a number of oekaki works on the Shinsengumi. If you are diligent in poking around...

http://bts.cside.ne.jp/tokgarchrgar/work/oeb/oeb_others.html
You'll find some PMK renditions of Souji, Yamazaki and Sakamoto above

Very clean style. *envies*
S

red-bird.org | s-girl.deviantart.com

messages.subject: Re: Doujinshi Cover as Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: Well ok only JO looks good with some facial hair (^_^) The men (young and old) were all sent to Inawashiro temporarily. Teens were then sent to Edo (Tokyo)
messages.messageBody:
Well ok only JO looks good with some facial hair (^_^)

The men (young and old) were all sent to Inawashiro temporarily.
Teens were then sent to Edo (Tokyo)
Adults like SAitou Hajime (Ichinohe Denpachi) were sent to many other
places including Tokyo but in the case of SAitou, Takada and then
finally Aomori (in the north).
Teens like the other characters I drew -stayed- in Edo/Tokyo and
attended school while living in prison camps there.

From history, we know that *Joushitai member Yamamoto Yae remembered
Takagi Goro/ MOrinusuke (Tokio's brother)....so I see him having an
eternal crush on her.

As for the others *Takamine Hideo, *Yamakawa Kenjiro and *Numazawa
Shichiro they are all TERUHIME's OTAKU. Takagi Tokio was the
assistant to Aizu's princess Teru.

[but] if these teenagers and Saitou [did] meet...it would be at
INawashiro......

[Yamakawa Kenjiro] "I'm going to escape!"
[Numazawa Shichiro] "yeah I'll go with you---and we'll kill any guard
who tries to stop us!"
[Takamine Hideo] "this sounds like a really -bad- idea"
[Takagi Goro/MOrinusuke] "Shut up HIdeo----here guys let me draw a
map" ::draws map in the dirt with a twig::

*Saitou/Ichinohe Denpachi* ::walks by:: "NOne of you are
leaving---you'll just get your punk-@sses killed!!!"

Kenjiro/Shichiro/Hideo/Goro (*_*) "Yessir" ::they all sulk::

----------------------------------
**explanations**

[footnote: Sorry, sorry I mentioned alot of names not related to the
Shinsengumi---it is kizu's fault! ::LOL:: This is why I just mentioned
Takagi Goro/MOrinusuke (everyone knows TAKAGI Tokio from Kenshin).
Every single one of those people are connected to the Fujita family
during the Meiji http://www.shinsengumihq.com/AizuBeyond1868.htm

not "connected" like meet once a year--but real close---in the case of
Numazawa Shichiro ---he ADOPTED Goro and Tokio's third son

What is *Joushitai you ask?...
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/WB.htm

messages.subject: Re: Doujinshi Cover as Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: Great going Sec! Ooh… Don t like facial hair? But eh… he looks so… so… Yummy!  Looks like a cross of Jo and the bangs is RK Saitou? Now… How about
messages.messageBody:
Great going Sec! Ooh Don't like facial hair? But eh he looks so
so Yummy! Looks like a cross of Jo and the bangs is RK Saitou?

Now How about this suggestion.

Aside from the cover actually- do a full blown doujinshi? It would
be so fun to see the three in there, perhaps not the so "serious"
story line but more gag like Hmmm Morinosuke throwing ninja stars
at Inoue-san to stay away from his sis while he's still having women
issues LOL! And what do we do about T-sensei? Hmmm maybe have him
have a secret crush on Yaso and he'll teach her about his ideas on
modernizing Japan's educational system Oh maybe not, Yaso might
ummm not react well to it. But it will keep her distracted enough
while the wolf gets distracted as well with Tokio *snicker*


Oh it won't fit this VERY COOL COVER! Oh well serious drama then.
PUH-LEASE? ^__^



~Kizu

messages.subject: Doujinshi Cover as Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: I was over at http://www.hajimenokizu.com .wait. you ve never BEEN TO HNK?  well go and check it out The charm of doujinshi is the many renditions of your
messages.messageBody:
I was over at http://www.hajimenokizu.com
.wait. you've never BEEN TO HNK? well go and check it out
The charm of doujinshi is the many renditions of your favorite
characters from all different "universes"

so I was thinking...
what if fans made up their own doujinshi?---maybe not an ENTIRE
doujinshi but just the cover...

THE FOURTH NAME
covers the bio of Saitou between the time he dropped the name
Yamaguchi Jiro to when he starts using Fujita Goro
the fourth name is ***Ichinohe Denpachi so the story is post Aizu
defeat to when he gets married and uses the name Fujita

just to make this a doujinshi for women ofcourse there will be YASO
and Tokio....you know to make things "interesting" (look if Japanese
artists can pair up Saitou with Hiko then I can do anything)

please use your imagination pretend it is all colorful and glossy and
real professional
I dislike facial hair on guys---but since this is Saitou as a prisoner
of war in perpetual kinshin---then he's got to have a beard
warning: Saitou is a "pretty boy" (^_^)
http://1happyturtle.com/temporary/4thname.jpg

note: I was reading some posts in Japanese Aizu fandom and finally
someone came up with a wacky idea "Takagi Goro/Morinusuke as Byakkotai
Ninja"

*Takagi MOrinusuke was Tokio's younger brother (age 14/15 in 1868 so
technically he was a bit too young to be in the Byakkotai)
he was just a messenger and scout during the siege...but he -can- be a
ninja in camouflage---I drew him in the top box
